title: Get the Most Out of Slack
description: Learn more, get support from your mentors and peers, and level up faster. (Bonus: How to post formatted code!)

title: Tips, Tricks, & Common Conventions
description: Semicolons, commenting, indenting, helpful IDE settings, and keyboard shortcuts

title: How To Google All the Things
description: Resourcefulness is a learned skill - finesse your searches to drill down to the results you actually need.

title: How to Create a Program with Multiple Functions
description: Learn how to break down the requirements and methodically code one part at a time until it all works together.

title: Improving Your Home Learning Environment
description: Learn how small changes can make a huge difference in your concentration and productivity while learning from home.

title: MySpace Fun Facts
description: Practice saving values with different data types and formatting output.

title: Mad Libs
description: Have a little fun telling a wacky story while practicing with variables and formatting in the console.

title: Can I Get Some Input?
description: Import readline-sync & get user input.

title: Data Type Conversions
description: Learn how to convert between different data types.

title: Cookies 'N' Cream
description: How to use booleans and conditional statements with if/else blocks to handle logic

title: Terms & Conditions
description: Practice writing conditional statements with if/else blocks and incorporating the && and || operators.

title: String Basics
description: Bracket notation, combining & building strings, escape characters, etc.

title: String Methods
description: Practice using the most common string methods for basic operations and with conditionals.

title: Template Literals
description: The most natural way to integrate strings and variables, using back ticks and a special placeholder syntax.

title: Practice with Arrays
description: Practice using the most common array methods.

title: Strings vs Arrays
description: A few examples illustrating the differences and similarities when working with strings and arrays.

title: Method Chaining
description: Examples of method chaining when working with strings and arrays.

title: Multidimensional Arrays
description: Learn the basics of nested arrays.

title: Array Methods & Multidimensional Arrays
description: A more in-depth exploration of nested arrays.

title: For Loop Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of for loops.

title: While Loops
description: Learn the fundamentals of while loops.

title: Next-Level Loops
description: Take advantage of various looping strategies to DRY your code.

title: Looping through Multi-dimensional Arrays
description: Practice looping through 2D and 3D arrays.

title: Function Basics
description: Get a better understanding of basic function syntax and a little practice.

title: Writing Helper Functions
description: Learn how to DRY your code by creating helper functions for your primary functions.

title: Variable Scope
description: Learn why it is important to scope your variables correctly.

title: Birthday Candles
description: Build your problem-solving skills using functions, loops, and conditionals.

title: Fun with Circles
description: Create an interactive program that prints circles of different diameters.

title: Interactive Caesar Cipher
description: A fun take on the classic caesar cipher problem.

title: Convert to Roman Numerals
description: A challenging and interesting problem to solve!

title: Object Basics
description: Practice creating objects with key/value pairs and accessing & modifying their values.

title: Object Ops
description: Practice looping through object keys and arrays within objects.

title: Objects: For...In Loops
description: Get some in-depth practice working with more complex objects.

title: Objects with Methods
description: Learn the different ways to add methods to objects.

title: Geometry
description: Practice creating, importing, and using code in a module.

title: Morse Code
description: Practice using modules and create an interactive morse code translator.

title: Guess What?
description: For students who enjoyed GA#2, Scrabble Scorer, and want a bigger challenge.

title: 21 (Blackjack)
description: An example of a more complex program with multiple modules.

title: Yahtzee!
description: An example of a more complex program with multiple modules.

title: TDD Basics
description: Practice TDD while writing a simple function.

title: Handling Exceptions
description: Learn different ways to create custom errors, throw errors, and handle errors.

title: JavaScript Class Basics
description: Practice creating classes and working with properties and methods.

title: JavaScript Class Inheritance
description: Multiple examples of class inheritance with a refreshing twist.

title: Hello, World!
description: A very simple exercise in learning basic HTML.

title: HTML Tables
description: Learn how to code and style different types of tables with HTML and CSS

title: My Favorite Hobby
description: Put together a simple page and add CSS classes to your HTML.

title: DOM Basics: Click Events
description: Practice handling click events and changing style properties
note: FORK your own copy and then clone it down to your local machine for exploration and experimentation!

title: Other DOM Events
description: Mouseover, mouseout, mousedown, mouseup, & more.
note: FORK your own copy and then clone it down to your local machine for exploration and experimentation!

title: DOM Methodology
description: How to decide which DOM methods to use to create objects for elements and add listeners.
note: FORK your own copy and then clone it down to your local machine for exploration and experimentation!

title: Weekly Planner
description: Form validation and adding HTML to a page in the DOM
note: FORK your own copy and then clone it down to your local machine for exploration and experimentation!

title: Fetching JSON: Quotes, Advice, & Dad Jokes
description: Examples of connecting to public APIs with different requirements.
note: FORK all branches and then clone it down to your local machine so you can practice!

title: TypeScript Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of TypeScript syntax.

title: Angular Basics
description: Create a simple page using components.
note: Read the src/instructions.txt file first once you open the project on your local computer.

title: Angular Directives
description: Create a more complex single-page app using directives.
note: FORK all branches and then clone it down to your local machine so you can practice!

title: Finding Logic Errors with console.log
description: A few well-placed comments can help you narrow down your search for logic errors!

title: Favorite Things
description: Practice combining the knowledge & skills needed for Graded Assignment #1.
note: Use the starter code to code along with the live tutorial.

title: Haunted House
description: Practice combining the knowledge & skills needed for Graded Assignment #1.
note: Use the starter code to code along with the live tutorial.

description: Learn how to put together a program with multiple functions and prepare for Graded Assignment #2.
note: Use the starter code to code along with the live tutorial.

description: Learn how to put together a program with multiple functions and prepare for Graded Assignment #2.
note: Use the starter code to code along with the live tutorial.

description: Combine your knowledge of modules, classes, and unit testing to prep for Graded Assignment #3.

description: Combine your knowledge of HTML and CSS to prep for Graded Assignment #4.

title: Small Business Savvy
description: This project will MORE than prepare you for Graded Assignment #4!

description: Use your knowledge of Angular to prep for Graded Assignment #6.

title: All the Lists

title: Advanced JavaScript, Part 1
description: Learn about the spread operator, rest operator, and destructuring.

title: Advanced JavaScript, Part 2
description: Learn about arrow functions and common higher-order functions like .map() and .forEach().

title: Jenny
description: Practice your live coding skills by manipulating a string of characters.

title: Highest Number
description: Practice your live coding skills by finding the highest number in an array.

title: Palindromes
description: Practice your live coding skills by determining which words in an array are palindromes.

title: Longest Word
description: Practice your live coding skills by finding the longest word with no repeating letters in an array.

title: Student Attendance
description: Practice your live coding skills by finding the longest word in an array.
